name: .ESM File Extension
summary: Learn about .ESM files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Bethesda Softworks games that use ESM files automatically load and use the files when you play the games.
You can also view and edit custom ESM files with the Creation Kit or The Elder Scrolls Construction Set (TESCS) in Windows.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
